segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined, even though the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks so excited, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and just know how to get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely unaware, which makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it unless she turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is a bit of a mess, but the kids are the real show here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how brave they are, sneaking cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they share those cookies with me if they manage to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just too entertaining to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
